description:
The group tries to investigate the disturbance at Keele`s dungeon as a result of a magic circle that Aqua had left. Strange explosive doll-like creatures have appeared, thus, putting the town in danger. Kazuma and Darkness encounters one of the Devil King`s generals, Vanir, who has the ability to read minds and possess their body.
Source: Kono Subarashii Sekai Ni Shukufuku Wo! Wiki

titles.title: De la soumission pour cette chevalière masquée !
Der Dämon mit der eisernen Maske
Kono Kamen no Kishi ni Reizoku o!
この仮面の騎士に隷属を!
